definitions.text: an account of an amusing incident (usually with a punch line)

examples: an amusing film with a steady stream of pranks and pratfalls
funny stories that made everybody laugh
it would have been laughable if it hadn't hurt so much

definitions.text: beyond or deviating from the usual or expected
examples: her speech has a funny twang
they have some funny ideas about war
the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves
something definitely queer about this town
there was something fishy about the accident
told the doctor about the funny sensations in her chest
